name: Alexander Mills Origami Dripper recipe
short_description: Origami Dripper recipe by [Alexander Mills](https://alexandermills.ca/), a consultant in the coffee industry and dedicated home brewer. Note that this recipe uses Kalita Coffee filters.

steps.description: Grind coffee, pre-rinse filter and add coffee. Place on scales and zero out.
Bloom coffee with (0.2 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water and agitate with a few gentle swirls of the dripper.
Pour up to (1.0 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water in slow, concentric circles, finishing with your last pour around the outside of the filter. Gently swirl the brewer one more time.

name: Jia Ning Du Origami Dripper recipe
short_description: Origami Dripper recipe by Jia Ning Du, the first Chinnese barista who won World Brewers Cup (WBrC). This is her winning recipe. [Here's the tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HNDnngFhZMU).

steps.description: Rinse filter and brewer with hot water. Grind your coffee. Pour in grounds, zero out the scales.
Pour up to (0.5835 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water

name: Carlos Medina's Origami Dripper recipe
short_description: This is a recipe by Carlos Medina from Chile, who won World Brewers Cup with it in 2023. Look at the recording of his winning perfomance [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ed8w-RKhR5U). Note that Carlos used conical filters for this recipe.

steps.description: Rinse Origami dripper and filter with hot water. Grind your coffee. Pour in grounds, zero out the scales.
Pour up to (0.4 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water.
Pour up to (0.6 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water.
Pour up to (0.8 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water.
Pour up to (1.0 x <final_water_amount>)g. of water.
